reference.title: Create a New Device dialog
reference.shortdesc: Creates a new Android Virtual Device (AVD).

section.p: When creating a new device you are presented with a series of dialogs in sequence. The first simply asks for a name for the new AVD; supply a name and click Next. The second dialog contains basic information about the AVD; see for details. The third dialog, which is optional, allows you to specify startup options to be applied each time the emulator is started. describes the available startup options.
